title: Honoring Dana and Mike Seguljic of Lake George, New York, upon the occasion of being named Post-Star Citizens of the Year
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Dana and Mike Seguljic of Lake George,
New York, upon the occasion of being named  POST-STAR  Citizens  of  the
Year

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, Dana and Mike Seguljic have given not only of their time  and
energies  but  also of their competence, intelligence and leadership and
consequently have been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Dana
and  Mike  Seguljic of Lake George, New York, upon the occasion of being
named POST-STAR Citizens of the Year; and
  WHEREAS, The Seguljics, who moved to Lake George  from  the  state  of
Connecticut  nearly  seven  years  ago,  got  involved in a project that
directly affected them; in their  particular  case,  it  was  a  36-unit
subdivision planned for 288 acres near their home; and
  WHEREAS,  As the Seguljics began investigating the project, they real-
ized that the town was ignoring several important issues, including  the
project's  density and the ownership of the parcel; the couple then went
to the town meetings with a list of specific concerns; and
  WHEREAS, Dana and Mike Seguljic researched the  issues  and  the  laws
thoroughly, and also tried to enlist in their cause the participation of
fellow citizens, government officials and the media; and
  WHEREAS,  For their dedication and concern for the welfare of the Lake
George community and the health of the lake itself, Dana and Mike Segul-
jic have been chosen as the 2010 POST-STAR Citizens of  the  Year;  they
are invaluable assets to their community; and
  WHEREAS,  Dana  and  Mike Seguljic have been called upon to contribute
their time and talents to countless civic and charitable  endeavors  and
have always given of themselves unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS,  Throughout  the  entire period of their community service, a
period of constructive involvement, Dana and Mike  Seguljic  have  stood
constant in dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by individuals
for  the  benefit  of others which Dana and Mike Seguljic have displayed
throughout their lives; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Dana and Mike Seguljic of Lake George, New York, upon the occasion
of being named POST-STAR Citizens of the Year; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Dana and Mike Seguljic.
